  • Method Details

    • contractEdge

      public ShrinkableGraph.Builder contractEdge(Edge e) throws EdgeException
      Contracts an edge e = {u, v} into a new vertex w.
      1. w's component is the union of u and v's components.
      2. Edges incident to w have weights equal to the sum of corresponding edges from u and v plus any existing weight.
      Parameters:
      e - the edge to contract
      Returns:
      this Builder instance
      Throws:
      EdgeException - if an invalid edge is provided
      IllegalStateException - if either vertex of the edge is missing
